response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication to quality. We are excited to offer you this opportunity to experience its unique features and benefits. Considering its craftsmanship and the value it brings, we kindly propose a price of $15,000 for the product. We believe this offers a fair exchange for the investment you would be making. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 15000}
